title: Purchasing Help
description:
**Trouble with making purchases?**
If you cannot make purchases, visit [Google Support](https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/1050566) or [App Store support page](https://support.apple.com/billing) for help.

**Trouble with delivery?**
Send an e-mail to armies_help@boooea.com along with the following information:
• What kind of product you have purchased.
• Screenshot with the payment info (order number).
• Your PvP ID.
